Class Assignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • tn.Assignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ODPairAssignment>

    public class Assignment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<ODPairAssignment>
    Traffic assignment, i.e. the volume of traffic assigned to each path

      void add(Assignment other)

      void combine(Assignment other, double thisFactor)
      Combine the given assignment into this assignment such that this assignment becomes:= a.route := [A * a.route , B * b.route)] , where A = (ratio *a.volume)/(a.volume +b.volume), B = ((1-ratio)* b.volume), a.volume = ratio *a.volume + (1-ratio)* b.volume, a = this.assignment.get(od), b= other.assignment.get(od), for all od

      • combine

        public void combine(Assignment other,
                    double thisFactor)
        Combine the given assignment into this assignment such that this assignment becomes:= a.route := [A * a.route , B * b.route)] , where A = (ratio *a.volume)/(a.volume +b.volume), B = ((1-ratio)* b.volume), a.volume = ratio *a.volume + (1-ratio)* b.volume, a = this.assignment.get(od), b= other.assignment.get(od), for all od
        Parameters:
        other - the other assignment to combine with this one
        thisFactor - ratio for this assignment. (1-ratio) for other assignment
